BIO

Emmanuel Ajayi is a Front-End Web Developer; right from his youthful years, He developed an amazing interest in programming because He wanted to have the power to Create something He could call His own, programming seems to give Him those priviledges, and in February 2018;
He decided to pursue a career in Web. Development, and He hasn't looked back eversince; He's currently skilled proficiently in languages like HTML, CSS, SASS, JavaScript and He uses the Angular Framework proficiently and He's currently a Jnr. Front-End Developer at Upperlink Limited.
